## BooleanValue class

A boolean value fed to or fetched from a Smart Contract contract, as an immutable abstraction.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class BooleanValue extends PrimitiveValue 
```
**Extends:** [PrimitiveValue](./sdk-core.primitivevalue.md)
